title: Episode 119: Trauma, Anxiety, Empathy, and Sex. Celebrating Some Student Research
itunes:author: UW-Green Bay Psychology Department
itunes:summary: In this episode we highlight UWGB undergraduate research being presented at the Midwestern Psychological Association Annual Meeting in April 2022. Hear all about the fascinating studies our students are presenting on topics such as early childhood trauma and anxiety related to empathy, ways to measure anxiety and depression in preclinical studies with mice, and an exploration of unsolicited sexually explicit images and messages.
